description:
P-handle Allen wrenches are comfortable in your hand, and feel solid and durable. Ergonomic nylon handles offer a secure grip when you're cranking bolts.

  • Made of hardened, high-torque steel for long life and precision fit
  • Includes 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8 and 10mm sizes
  • Shaft lengths are designed to minimize the wind-up and flex of longer wrenches
  • Ball end and long shaft make it easy to reach awkward bolts
  • Short end is chamfered for high-torque applications
  • Included holder easily mounts to wall or pegboard
name: Park Tool PH-1.2 P-Handle Hex Wrench Set with Holder
